caption:
Climbed all the way out into the river and deliberately got my feet all wet for this one. Not even that wow but I felt given the effort I had to post it anyway.

Promise it's the last polarized river you'll get for a while. On the sleeper train home again, back to work tomorrow. .
.
.

location.name: Muir Of Ord, Highland, United Kingdom
